quotation: Mere bagair jise farq nahi padta- Mai uske saath bhi rehta to kya badal jaata?
Dil aaj taqleef me hai- Aur taqleef dene wala Dil me.
Jo mehnat pe bharosa karte hain- wo qismat ki baat kabhi nahi karte.
Har ghane baadal ke peeche ek sunehri kiran hoti hai.
Sometimes people stay in your heart- but not in your life.
Nothing hurts more than realizing- They meant everything to you- But you meant nothing to them.
If you are brave enough to say goodbye- Life will reward you with a new hello.
Be there for other- But never leave yourself behind.
The Finest Souls are those who gulped Pain@ And avoided making others taste it.
Bas isi ummeed pe hota gaya barbaad mai- Agar kabhi bikhra to aa kar tu samhalega mujhe.
Kabhi#kabhi kho bhi jaana chahiye- Ye dekhne ke liye ki taalash karne kaun aata hai.
Palat kar jab bhi tum dekhoge hamaari or- Ham hamesha tumko* tumhari or hi dekhte milenge.
You meet everyone twice in this life- when they come and when they go.
Death is not the greatest loss in life.@ The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
Behind every sweet smile* there is a bitter sadness@ that no one can ever see and feel.
It's sad when someone you know- becomes someone you knew.
Sad thing happen. They do. @But we don't need to live sad forever.
You know* a heart can be broken- but it keeps on beating* just the same.
People cry* not because they are weak. @ It is because they've been strong for too long.
He who has fel the deepest grief @is best able to experience supreme happiness.
Do you love life? Then do not squander time- for that's the stuff that life is made of.
Never leave 'till tomorrow@which you can do today.
Ham waha hain jahan se hamko bhi- Kuch hamaari khabar nahi aati.
Life is a tragedy in close#up and a comedy in longshot.@ If you sit#back visually on a situation-it automatically becomes funnier.
Shauq hi nahi raha ab main khud ko saabit karun- Ab to app jo samajh le wahi hoon mai.
Insaan me itni taaqat hamesha honi chahiye- Ki apne dukh aur apne sangharshon se@ akele juujh sake.
Ab agli baar jab koi kahega mohabbat hai tumse- Bas yahi puchunga # Kab tak rahegi?
The world breaks everyone* the very good* the very brave* the very gentle.@And those it doesn't break* it Kills.
Juda hue hain bahut log ek tum bhi sahi- Ab itni si baat pe kya zindagi haraam kare.
Ek zakhm mujhko chahiye mere mizaaj ka- Yaani haraa bhi chahiye gehraa bhi chahiye- Kya ho gaya jo ho gaya hoon mai thoda bahut kharaab- Thoda bahut kharab to hona bhi chahiye.
Poori duniya ke saamne Mazboot bante logon ko- Band kamron ke aksar toot#te hue dekha hai.
Ham to dusmanon ko bhi paakiza saja dete hain- Haath nahi uthaate* nazron se gira dete hain.
Dushmanon se pyaar hota jayega- Doston ko ajmaate jaiye.
Apne halat ka khud ehsaas nahi mujhko- Maine auron se suna hai ki pareshaan hoon mai.
Wo kahani tumhe kabhi sunai nahi jayegi- Jisme sunaane wala khud gunehgar ho.
Nahi mila hai koi tujhsa aaj tak mujhko- Phir ye sitam alag hai ki mila tu bhi nahi.
Kaun kehta hai umr bhar Nibaah kijiye- Bas aaiye* baithiye* Tabaah kijiye.
Khoob yaad rahega ye daur hamko- Kya khoob tarse hain ek shaqs ke liye.
Tum samajh hi na paaye- Mai badal nahi raha tha- Khatam ho raha tha.
Jo guzaari na ja saki hamse- Hamne wo zindagi guzaari hai.
Days will pass and you will abandon things you were addicted to- and leave someone* and cancel a dream- and finally#accept a reality.
There is no man living who isn't capable of @ doing more than he thinks he can do.
Whatever a mind can conceive@ and believe, it can achieve.
The more easily you get offended- the less intelligent you actually are.
The ability to observe without evaluating@is the highest form of intelligence.
Phir kuch yun hua ki sabr ki ungli pakad ke ham@ Kuch itna chale ki manjilen hairaan ho gayin.
Agar tum samajh jaao taqleef meri- To tumhe mere hasne pe bhi taras aayega.
We suffer more in our imagination than in the reality.
Sirf aawaz dene se kaarvan ruka nahi karte- Dekha ye bhi jaata hai ki pukaara kisne hai.
I don't know who discovered water- but it was probably not the fish.
A friend to all is a friend to none.
Ye soch#kar ki kisi ki khushi me gam na mile- Koi jo hamse milne bhi aaya to usse ham na mile.
Someday* someone will brake you so badly- thay you'll become unbreakable.
Some people want to see you fail- Disappoint them.
Teri halat se lagta hai tera apna tha koi- Itni saadgi se barbaad koi gair nahi karta.
Yaani ye khamoshi bhi kisi kaam ki nahi?@ Yaani main bayaan kar ke bataun@ki udaas hoon mai?
Tum dard de kar bhi ache lagte ho- Hamdard hote to kya gazab hota.
Agli baar milo to haath mat milaana- Tum thaam nahi paaoge@Aur ham Chhor nahi payenge.
Kya pata qayamat gujar chuki ho- Aur ham jahannum me jee rahe hon.
Ab majeej usse ye rishta nahi rakha jaata- Jis#se ek shaks ka parda nahi rakha jaata- Padhne jaata hoon to tasme nahi baandhe jaate- Ghar patat#ta hoon to basta nahi rakha jaata

Ye maine kab kaha ki mere haq me faisla kare- Agar wo mujh se khush nahi hai to mujhe juda kare-  Mai uske saath jis tarah gujaarta hoon zindagi- Use to chahiye ki mera shukriya ada kare- @ Meri dua hai aur ek tarah se bad#dua bhi hai- Khud tumhe tumhare jaisi betiyan ataa kare.
Tu kisi aur hi duniya me mili thi mujhse- Tu kisi aur hi mausam ki mahak laayi thi- Dar raha tha ki kahin jakhm na bhar jayen mere- Aur tu mutthiyan bhar bhar ke namak laayi thi.
